priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire FAMS Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C112441

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire FAMS Test Code Terminology

definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis Version 4 test code.
name: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis Version 4 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FAMS Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis Version 4 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: Because of my physical condition, I have trouble meeting the needs of my family.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Have Trouble Meeting Needs of Family Because of My Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I am able to work (include work at home).
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Am Able to Work

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I have trouble walking.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Trouble Walking

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I have to limit my social activity because of my condition.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Limit Social Activity Because of Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I have strength in my legs.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Strength in My Legs
synonyms: FAMS01-I Have Strength in My Legs

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I have trouble getting around in public places.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Getting Around in Public Places

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Mobility: I have to take my condition into account when making plans.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Have to Take Condition Into Account When Making Plans

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I have nausea.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Nausea

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I have pain.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Pain

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I feel ill.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Ill

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I feel weak all over.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Weak All Over

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I have pain in my joints.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Pain in My Joints
synonyms: FAMS01-I Have Pain in My Joints

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I am bothered by headaches.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Headaches

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Symptoms: I am bothered by muscle pains.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Muscle Pains
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Bothered by Muscle Pains

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I feel sad.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Sad

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I am losing hope in the fight against my illness.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Losing Hope in Fight Against My Illness

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I am able to enjoy life.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Am Able to Enjoy Life
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Able to Enjoy Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I feel trapped by my condition.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Trapped by My Condition
synonyms: FAMS01-I Feel Trapped by My Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I am depressed about my condition.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Depressed About My Condition
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Depressed About My Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I feel useless.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Useless

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Emotional Well-Being: I feel overwhelmed by my condition.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Overwhelmed by My Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: My work (include work at home) is fulfilling.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - My Work is Fulfilling

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I have accepted my illness.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Have Accepted My Illness

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I am enjoying the things I usually do for fun.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Enjoying Things I Usually Do for Fun
synonyms: FAMS01-Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I am content with the quality of my life right now.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Content With Quality of My Life Now
synonyms: FAMS01-Content With Quality of My Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I am frustrated by my condition.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Am Frustrated by My Condition
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Frustrated by My Condition

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I feel a sense of purpose in my life.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Sense of Purpose in My Life
synonyms: FAMS01-Feel Sense of Purpose in My Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - General Contentment: I feel motivated to do things.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Motivated to Do Things
synonyms: FAMS01-I Feel Motivated to Do Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have a lack of energy.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Have a Lack of Energy
synonyms: FAMS01-I Have a Lack of Energy

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I feel tired.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Tired

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have trouble starting things because I am tired.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Starting Things Because I Am Tired

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have trouble finishing things because I am tired.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Finishing Things Because I Am Tired

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I need to rest during the day.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Need to Rest During the Day
synonyms: FAMS01-I Need to Rest During the Day

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have trouble remembering things.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Remembering Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have trouble concentrating.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Concentrating

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: My thinking is slower than before.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - My Thinking is Slower Than Before
synonyms: FAMS01-My Thinking Is Slower Than Before

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Thinking and Fatigue: I have trouble learning new tasks or directions.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Learning New Tasks or Directions
synonyms: FAMS01-I Have Trouble Learning New Tasks

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: I feel close to my friends.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Close to My Friends
synonyms: FAMS01-I Feel Close to My Friends

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: I get emotional support from my family.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Get Emotional Support From Family

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: I get support from my friends.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Get Support From Friends
synonyms: FAMS01-I Get Support From My Friends

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: My family has accepted my illness.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Family Has Accepted My Illness
synonyms: FAMS01-My Family Has Accepted My Illness

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: I am satisfied with family communication about my illness.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Satisfied With Family Communication About My Illness

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: My family has trouble understanding when my condition gets worse.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Family Has Trouble Understanding When My Condition Gets Worse

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Family/Social Well-Being: I feel 'left out' of things.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Left Out of Things
synonyms: FAMS01-I Feel Left Out of Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by side effects of treatment.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Side Effects of Treatment

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am forced to spend time in bed.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Forced to Spend Time in Bed
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Forced to Spend Time in Bed

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I feel close to my partner (or the person who is my main support).
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Feel Close to My Partner
synonyms: FAMS01-I Feel Close to My Partner

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am satisfied with my sex life.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Satisfied With My Sex Life
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Satisfied With My Sex Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am satisfied with how I am coping with my illness.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Satisfied With How I Am Coping With Illness
synonyms: FAMS01-Satisfied With How I Am Coping

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I feel nervous.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Feel Nervous

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I worry that my condition will get worse.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Worry My Condition Will Get Worse
synonyms: FAMS01-Worry My Condition Will Get Worse

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am sleeping well.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - I Am Sleeping Well

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: Heat worsens my symptoms.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Heat Worsens My Symptoms

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I have trouble controlling my urine.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Trouble Controlling My Urine

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I urinate more frequently than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Urinate More Frequently Than Usual

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by the chills.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Chills
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Bothered by the Chills

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by fevers (episodes of high body temperature).
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Fevers

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Multiple Sclerosis - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by muscle spasms.
terms.preferredTerm: FAMS - Bothered by Muscle Spasms
synonyms: FAMS01-I Am Bothered by Muscle Spasms
